data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
The first-half is just kicking off.
In Beveren a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Anderlecht's Peter Zulj gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Waasland-Beveren defender.
Nicolas Laforge signals a free kick to Waasland-Beveren in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Anderlecht.
Waasland-Beveren awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Waasland-Beveren in the half of Anderlecht.
Michel Vlap puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Jeremy Doku with an assist there.
Can Anderlecht get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Waasland-Beveren's half?
Throw-in for Anderlecht at Freethielstadion.
Waasland-Beveren awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Anderlecht to take a throw-in in Waasland-Beveren territory.
Throw-in for Waasland-Beveren in their own half.
Aboubakary Koita of Waasland-Beveren smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Anderlecht have been awarded a corner by Nicolas Laforge.
Nicolas Laforge signals a Anderlecht throw-in in Waasland-Beveren's half.
Corner awarded to Anderlecht.
Throw-in for Anderlecht in the half of Waasland-Beveren.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Beveren.
Nicolas Laforge awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Waasland-Beveren in the half of Anderlecht.
Nicolas Laforge awards Anderlecht a goal kick.
Nicolas Laforge signals a Anderlecht throw-in in Waasland-Beveren's half.
Michel Vlap for the away team is judged to be offside.
Anderlecht have been awarded a corner by Nicolas Laforge.
Waasland-Beveren to take a throw-in in Anderlecht territory.
Free kick Anderlecht.
Throw-in Waasland-Beveren.
Thomas Agyepong gets his shot on target but fails to score for Waasland-Beveren.
Ball goes out of play for a Waasland-Beveren goal kick.
Free kick for Waasland-Beveren in their own half.
Albert Sambi Lokonga for Anderlecht drives towards goal at Freethielstadion. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Anderlecht.
Nicolas Laforge signals a free kick to Waasland-Beveren in their own half.
Goal kick for Waasland-Beveren at Freethielstadion.
Nicolas Laforge signals a free kick to Anderlecht.
In Beveren a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Anderlecht capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Waasland-Beveren's half?
In Beveren Anderlecht's Jeremy Doku is caught offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nicolas Laforge signals a free kick to Waasland-Beveren.
Free kick for Anderlecht in their own half.
Waasland-Beveren awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vincent Kompany (Anderlecht) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Aboubakary Koita.
Aboubakary Koita is back on the pitch.
Free kick for Waasland-Beveren in the half of Anderlecht.
Michael Murillo (Anderlecht) gets a yellow card.
Free kick Anderlecht.
Nicolas Laforge signals a free kick to Anderlecht in their own half.
Thomas Agyepong is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Thomas Agyepong has recovered and rejoins the match in Beveren.
Anderlecht have been awarded a corner by Nicolas Laforge.
In Beveren Waasland-Beveren drive forward through [47]. His shot is on target but it's saved.
At Freethielstadion, Waasland-Beveren are penalized for being offside.
Anderlecht are coming forward and Killian Sardella gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Waasland-Beveren have a goal kick.
Can Waasland-Beveren get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Anderlecht's half?
Nicolas Laforge will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Ball safe as Anderlecht is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Freethielstadion.
Nicolas Laforge awards the home team a throw-in.
Nicolas Laforge signals a throw-in for Waasland-Beveren, close to Anderlecht's area.
Waasland-Beveren make their first substitution with Yuki Kobayashi replacing Alexis Gamboa.
Free kick Anderlecht.
Nicolas Laforge signals a free kick to Anderlecht.
Corner awarded to Anderlecht.
Anderlecht's Vincent Kompany attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Nicolas Laforge awards Waasland-Beveren a goal kick.
Anderlecht awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marko Pjaca (Anderlecht) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Waasland-Beveren's Thomas Agyepong has run offside.
Throw-in Waasland-Beveren.
Throw-in for Waasland-Beveren at Freethielstadion.
Free kick for Waasland-Beveren in the half of Anderlecht.
In Beveren a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The match at Freethielstadion has been interrupted briefly for a check on Michael Murillo, who is down injured.
Ball goes out of play for a Waasland-Beveren goal kick.
Michael Murillo returns to the field for Anderlecht after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Anderlecht in their own half.
Free kick Anderlecht.
Waasland-Beveren's Yuki Kobayashi gets in a shot on goal at Freethielstadion. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Anderlecht in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Beveren to check on Michael Murillo, who is grimacing with pain.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Beveren.
Anderlecht's Michael Murillo is back in action after a slight knock.
Nicolas Laforge signals a Waasland-Beveren throw-in in Anderlecht's half.
Waasland-Beveren drive upfield and Yuki Kobayashi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Anderlecht defender.
Waasland-Beveren have been awarded a corner by Nicolas Laforge.
Aboubakary Koita (Waasland-Beveren) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Anderlecht have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Waasland-Beveren is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Francis Amuzu is on a sub for Marko Pjaca for Anderlecht.
The home team have replaced Djihad Bizimana with Beni Badibanga. This is the second substitution made today by Dirk Geeraerd.
Goal kick for Waasland-Beveren at Freethielstadion.
Nicolas Laforge awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Anderlecht at Freethielstadion.
Throw-in Waasland-Beveren.
Great finish from Michel Vlap to give Anderlecht a 0-2 lead.
Great play from Albert Sambi Lokonga to set up the goal.
Corner awarded to Waasland-Beveren.
Anderlecht awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Anderlecht in the half of Waasland-Beveren.
Anderlecht have been awarded a corner by Nicolas Laforge.
Free kick for Waasland-Beveren in their own half.
Ball safe as Waasland-Beveren is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Anderlecht awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Anderlecht have been awarded a corner by Nicolas Laforge.
Anderlecht to take a throw-in in Waasland-Beveren territory.
Corner awarded to Anderlecht.
Anderlecht needs to be cautious. Waasland-Beveren have an attacking throw-in.
Can Waasland-Beveren get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Anderlecht's half?
Thomas Agyepong is back on his feet again.
Goal kick for Anderlecht at Freethielstadion.
Attention is being given to Waasland-Beveren’s Thomas Agyepong and play has been suspended briefly.
Denzel Jubitana (Waasland-Beveren) has replaced the possibly injured Thomas Agyepong.
Nicolas Laforge signals a free kick to Anderlecht in their own half.
Dejan Joveljic of Anderlecht gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Waasland-Beveren goal kick.
Waasland-Beveren's Matthias Verreth misses with an attempt on goal.
Anderlecht have a goal kick.
Free kick for Waasland-Beveren in the half of Anderlecht.
Corner awarded to Waasland-Beveren.
Waasland-Beveren attack but Matthias Verreth's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Beveren.
Nicolas Laforge awards Waasland-Beveren a goal kick.
In Beveren a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Anderlecht's Peter Zulj gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Waasland-Beveren have a goal kick.
Nicolas Laforge awards Waasland-Beveren a goal kick.
Can Anderlecht get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Waasland-Beveren's half?
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Daam Foulon for Waasland-Beveren who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Waasland-Beveren's Daam Foulon looks ok and returns to the pitch.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Frank Vercauteren is making the team's second substitution at Freethielstadion with Edo Kayembe replacing Dejan Joveljic.
Throw-in for Anderlecht close to the penalty box.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Waasland-Beveren awarded a free kick in their own half.
Anderlecht have been given a penalty at Freethielstadion...
The match has come to a close in Beveren. The final score is 0-3.
Goal! Francis Amuzu extends Anderlecht's lead from the spot. They now lead 0-3.
Frank Vercauteren (Anderlecht) is making a third substitution, with Yari Verschaeren replacing Jeremy Doku.
